attributes.action: Arrest and detain all those named by the Daily Mail as having been NCCL/PIE activists in the 60s and 70s.
attributes.additional_details: Compelling evidence is arising which indicates that all of those named can reasonably be expected to be found guilty, in any trial, for conspiring to corrupt public morals, during their time on the NCCL in support of PIE.  It is an appalling indictement of the level of integrity, probity and morality among our current political and professional elite that NOBODY has come out to criticise and refuse  any longer to work with these perverts.

rejection.details: This is a police operational matter
